029package mod.deplayer.coffeechat.coffeeirc.server;
030
031import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpServer;
032import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpHandler;
033import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange;
034import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Logger;
035import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
036import mod.deplayer.coffeechat.coffeeirc.server.SwInfo;
037
038import java.io.*;
039import java.net.*;
040import java.net.http.HttpClient;
041import java.net.http.HttpRequest;
042import java.net.http.HttpResponse;
043import java.time.Duration;
044import java.util.HashMap;
045import java.util.Map;
046import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
047import java.time.LocalDateTime;
048import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
049import java.time.LocalDate;
050import java.security.KeyPair;
051import java.security.KeyPairGenerator;
052import java.security.PrivateKey;
053import java.security.PublicKey;
054import javax.crypto.Cipher;
055import javax.crypto.KeyGenerator;
056import javax.crypto.SecretKey;
057import javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec;
058import java.util.Base64;
059import java.security.SecureRandom;
060
061/**CIC服务器核心*/
062public class Server {
063
064    /**Server Main Logger<br>一般情况下，日志消息都要沿这样的方式编写：[类型]消息，因为仅靠那么几个log4j提供的消息类型是不够记录的*/
065    public Logger sml = (Logger) LogManager.getLogger(Server.class);
066
067    private int ipProtocol = 4;
068
069    private int port = 10025;
070
071    private String serverInstanceName = "CafeRoom";
072
073    private String serverDescription = "A IRC Server.";
074
075    private final String DistributionName;
076
077    private HttpServer serverHttp;
078
079    private Map<String, ClientInfo> connectedClients = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
080    private int clientIdCounter = 0;
081
082    private DateTimeFormatter timeFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
083    private DateTimeFormatter chatLogFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
084
085    private PrintWriter chatLogWriter;
086    private String currentChatLogDate;
087
088    private KeyPair serverRsaKeyPair;
089    private SecretKey serverAesKey;
090    private String customKey = null;
091    
092    public Server(int ipProtocol, int port, String serverInstanceName, String serverDescription, String DistributionName, String customKey){
093
094        this.ipProtocol = ipProtocol;
095        this.port = port;
096        this.serverInstanceName = serverInstanceName;
097        this.serverDescription = serverDescription;
098        this.DistributionName = DistributionName;
099        this.customKey = customKey;
100        sml.info("已创建服务器实例");
101
102    };
103
104    /// 服务器启动
105    public void startServer() throws IOException{
106        sml.info("[服务器初始化] 开始初始化HTTP服务器...");
107
108        initializeChatLog();
109        initializeServerEncryption(customKey);
110        
111        serverHttp = HttpServer.create(new InetSocketAddress(port), 0);
112
113        sml.info("[路由注册] 注册HTTP路由处理器...");
114        serverHttp.createContext("/connect", new ConnectHandler());
115        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/connect' 路由 - 处理客户端连接请求");
116        serverHttp.createContext("/message", new MessageHandler());
117        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/message' 路由 - 处理客户端消息发送");
118        serverHttp.createContext("/disconnect", new DisconnectHandler());
119        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/disconnect' 路由 - 处理客户端断开连接");
120        serverHttp.createContext("/broadcast", new BroadcastHandler());
121        sml.info("[路由注册] 已注册 '/broadcast' 路由 - 处理广播消息请求");
122
123        serverHttp.start();
124        sml.info("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
125        sml.info("[服务器启动成功] IRC服务器已成功启动");
126        sml.info("[监听信息] 服务器正在监听 IPv" + ipProtocol + ":" + port);
127        sml.info("[实例信息] 服务器实例名称: " + serverInstanceName);
128        sml.info("[实例信息] 服务器描述: " + serverDescription);
129        sml.info("");
130        sml.info("[核心信息]正在使用的CoffeeIRC核心的软件信息:");
131        sml.info("        版本号: " + SwInfo.version);
132        sml.info("        开发状态: " + SwInfo.softwareStatus);
133        sml.info("        版本代号: " + SwInfo.VerCodename);
134        sml.info("        支持协议: " + SwInfo.connection);
135        sml.info("");
136        sml.info("当前运行本核心的发行版: " + DistributionName);
137        sml.info("");
138        sml.info("如果遇到核心问题，请提交至: https://github.com/deplayeris/coffeeirc/issues");
139        sml.info("如在使用基于本核心的发行版(如无忧聊)时出现问题");
140        sml.info("请先检查是否为核心故障(通过查看核心日志)，若非核心问题请联系发行版作者");
141        sml.info("");
142        sml.info("核心问题提交步骤:");
143        sml.info("1. 在GitHub上创建新的Issue");
144        sml.info("2. 详细准确地描述遇到的问题");
145        sml.info("3. 附上出现问题时的核心日志文件");
146        sml.info("---------------------------------------------------------------------------------");
147        sml.info("[服务器就绪] 服务器已完全就绪，正在等待客户端连接...");
148    };
149
150    /// 常规的记录客户端信息的类，你也可以参考一下，这样管理真的很方便
151    class ClientInfo {
152        private String clientId;
153        private String username;
154        private String ipAddress;
155        private LocalDateTime connectTime;
156        private LocalDateTime lastActivityTime;
157
158        private PublicKey clientPublicKey;
159        private SecretKey aesKey;
160        private boolean encryptionEnabled;
161
162        public ClientInfo(String clientId, String username, String ipAddress) {
163            this.clientId = clientId;
164            this.username = username;
165            this.ipAddress = ipAddress;
166            this.connectTime = LocalDateTime.now();
167            this.lastActivityTime = LocalDateTime.now();
168        }
169
170        public String getClientId() { return clientId; }
171        public String getUsername() { return username; }
172        public String getIpAddress() { return ipAddress; }
173        public LocalDateTime getConnectTime() { return connectTime; }
174        public LocalDateTime getLastActivityTime() { return lastActivityTime; }
175        public void updateActivityTime() { this.lastActivityTime = LocalDateTime.now(); }
176
177        public String getFormattedConnectTime() {
178            return connectTime.format(timeFormatter);
179        }
180
181        public String getFormattedLastActivityTime() {
182            return lastActivityTime.format(timeFormatter);
183        }
184        
185
186        public PublicKey getClientPublicKey() { return clientPublicKey; }
187        public void setClientPublicKey(PublicKey key) { this.clientPublicKey = key; }
188        public SecretKey getAesKey() { return aesKey; }
189        public void setAesKey(SecretKey key) { this.aesKey = key; }
190        public boolean isEncryptionEnabled() { return encryptionEnabled; }
191        public void setEncryptionEnabled(boolean enabled) { this.encryptionEnabled = enabled; }
192    }
193
194    /// 连接处理器类
195    class ConnectHandler implements HttpHandler {
196        /// 处理客户端连接请求
197        /// @param exchange 请求对象
198        @Override
199        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
200            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
201                try {
202                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
203
204                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
205                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
206                    inputStream.close();
207
208                    String username = "未知用户";
209                    String clientPublicKeyStr = null;
210
211                    if (requestBody.contains("\"username\":\"")) {
212                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"username\":\"") + 12;
213                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
214                        if (end > start) {
215                            username = requestBody.substring(start, end);
216                        }
217                    }
218                    
219                    if (requestBody.contains("\"publicKey\":\"")) {
220                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"publicKey\":\"") + 13;
221                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
222                        if (end > start) {
223                            clientPublicKeyStr = requestBody.substring(start, end);
224                        }
225                    }
226
227                    String clientId = "client_" + (++clientIdCounter);
228
229                    ClientInfo clientInfo = new ClientInfo(clientId, username, clientIp);
230                    connectedClients.put(clientId, clientInfo);
231
232                    sml.info("[连接请求处理] 处理来自用户 '" + username + "' 的连接请求");
233                    sml.info("[客户端识别] 分配客户端ID: " + clientId);
234                    sml.info("[网络信息] 客户端IP地址: " + clientIp);
235
236                    String serverPublicKeyStr = null;
237                    String encryptedAesKeyStr = null;
238                    boolean encryptionSuccess = false;
239                    
240                    if (clientPublicKeyStr != null) {
241                        try {
242                            byte[] clientPubKeyBytes = Base64.getDecoder().decode(clientPublicKeyStr);
243
244                            encryptedAesKeyStr = encryptAesKey(null);
245                            if (encryptedAesKeyStr != null) {
246
247                                clientInfo.setAesKey(serverAesKey);
248                                clientInfo.setEncryptionEnabled(true);
249                                encryptionSuccess = true;
250                                
251                                sml.info("[加密握手] 与客户端 '" + username + "' 的加密握手成功");
252                            }
253                        } catch (Exception e) {
254                            sml.warn("[加密握手失败] 与客户端 '" + username + "' 的加密握手失败: " + e.getMessage());
255                        }
256                    }
257                    
258
259                    serverPublicKeyStr = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(serverRsaKeyPair.getPublic().getEncoded());
260
261                    sml.info("[连接建立] 用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 成功连接到服务器");
262                    sml.info("[时间戳记] 连接建立时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedConnectTime());
263                    sml.info("[统计信息] 当前在线用户总数: " + connectedClients.size());
264                    sml.info("[加密状态] 加密通讯: " + (encryptionSuccess ? "已启用" : "未启用"));
265
266                    StringBuilder responseBuilder = new StringBuilder();
267                    responseBuilder.append("{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"连接成功\",\"clientId\":\"")
268                                  .append(clientId).append("\"");
269                    
270                    if (serverPublicKeyStr != null) {
271                        responseBuilder.append(",\"serverPublicKey\":\"").append(serverPublicKeyStr).append("\"");
272                    }
273                    
274                    if (encryptedAesKeyStr != null) {
275                        responseBuilder.append(",\"encryptedAesKey\":\"").append(encryptedAesKeyStr).append("\"");
276                    }
277                    
278                    responseBuilder.append("}");
279                    String response = responseBuilder.toString();
280                    
281                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
282                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
283                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
284                    os.write(response.getBytes());
285                    os.close();
286                    sml.info("[响应完成] 已向用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 发送连接并且成功确认");
287
288                } catch (Exception e) {
289                    sml.error("[连接错误] 处理客户端连接请求时发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
290                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"连接失败\"}";
291                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
292                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
293                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
294                    os.write(response.getBytes());
295                    os.close();
296                }
297            } else {
298                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的连接请求");
299                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
300                exchange.close();
301            }
302        }
303    }
304
305    /// 消息处理器类
306    class MessageHandler implements HttpHandler {
307        @Override
308        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
309            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
310                try {
311                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
312
313                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
314                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
315                    inputStream.close();
316
317                    String encryptedMessage = "无内容";
318                    String message = "无内容";
319                    String clientId = "unknown";
320                    String username = "未知用户";
321
322                    if (requestBody.contains("\"message\":\"")) {
323                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"message\":\"") + 11;
324                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
325                        if (end > start) {
326                            encryptedMessage = requestBody.substring(start, end);
327                        }
328                    }
329
330                    if (requestBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
331                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
332                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
333                        if (end > start) {
334                            clientId = requestBody.substring(start, end);
335                        }
336                    }
337
338                    ClientInfo clientInfo = connectedClients.get(clientId);
339                    if (clientInfo != null) {
340                        username = clientInfo.getUsername();
341                        clientInfo.updateActivityTime();
342
343                        message = decryptClientMessage(encryptedMessage, clientInfo);
344                    } else {
345                        message = encryptedMessage;
346                    }
347
348                    String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(timeFormatter);
349                    sml.info("[消息处理] 处理来自客户端的消息请求");
350                    sml.info("[时间标记] 消息接收时间: " + timestamp);
351                    sml.info("[用户验证] 已验证用户身份: '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ")");
352                    sml.info("[内容审查] 接收到的消息内容: " + message);
353                    sml.info("[会话更新] 已更新用户 '" + username + "' 的最后活动时间");
354
355                    logChatMessage(username, message);
356
357                    if (message.startsWith("/")) {
358                        sml.info("[命令识别] 检测到特殊命令输入: " + message);
359                        if (message.equals("/users")) {
360                            sml.info("[用户查询] 用户 '" + username + "' 请求查看在线用户列表");
361                            sml.info("[统计查询] 当前在线用户总数: " + connectedClients.size());
362                            sml.info("[列表详情] 详细在线用户信息:");
363                            for (ClientInfo info : connectedClients.values()) {
364                                sml.info("[用户信息] 用户名: '" + info.getUsername() + "', 客户端ID: " + info.getClientId() + ", 连接时间: " + info.getFormattedConnectTime() + ", 最后活动: " + info.getFormattedLastActivityTime());
365                            }
366                        } else if (message.equals("/help")) {
367                            sml.info("[帮助请求] 用户 '" + username + "' 请求帮助文档");
368                        } else {
369                            sml.info("[未知命令] 用户 '" + username + "' 输入了未识别的命令: " + message);
370                        }
371                    } else {
372                    }
373
374                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"消息接收成功\",\"timestamp\":\"" + timestamp + "\"}";
375                    sml.info("[响应构造] 构造消息确认响应");
376                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
377                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
378                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
379                    os.write(response.getBytes());
380                    os.close();
381
382                    sml.info("[响应完成] 已向用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 发送消息接收确认");
383                    sml.info("[处理结束] 消息处理流程已完成");
384
385                } catch (Exception e) {
386                    sml.error("[消息错误] 处理客户端消息时发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
387                    e.printStackTrace();
388                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"消息处理失败\"}";
389                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
390                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
391                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
392                    os.write(response.getBytes());
393                    os.close();
394                }
395            } else {
396                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的消息请求");
397                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
398                exchange.close();
399            }
400        }
401    }
402
403    /// 断开连接处理器类
404    class DisconnectHandler implements HttpHandler {
405        @Override
406        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
407            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
408                try {
409
410                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
411
412                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
413                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
414                    inputStream.close();
415
416                    String clientId = "unknown";
417                    String username = "未知用户";
418
419                    if (requestBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
420                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
421                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
422                        if (end > start) {
423                            clientId = requestBody.substring(start, end);
424                        }
425                    }
426                    ClientInfo clientInfo = connectedClients.get(clientId);
427                    if (clientInfo != null) {
428                        username = clientInfo.getUsername();
429
430                        long onlineSeconds = java.time.Duration.between(clientInfo.getConnectTime(), LocalDateTime.now()).getSeconds();
431                        long hours = onlineSeconds / 3600;
432                        long minutes = (onlineSeconds % 3600) / 60;
433                        long seconds = onlineSeconds % 60;
434                        String onlineDuration = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds);
435
436                        sml.info("[断开请求] 处理用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 的断开连接请求");
437                        sml.info("[会话信息] 用户连接建立时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedConnectTime());
438                        sml.info("[会话时长] 用户总在线时长: " + onlineDuration);
439                        sml.info("[最后活动] 用户最后活跃时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedLastActivityTime());
440                        connectedClients.remove(clientId);
441                        sml.info("[会话终止] 已从活跃用户列表中移除用户 '" + username + "' (ID: " + clientId + ")");
442                        sml.info("[状态更新] 断开后当前在线用户数: " + connectedClients.size());
443                    } else {
444                        sml.warn("[断开异常] 检测到断开请求中的客户端ID不存在 尝试断开不存在的客户端连接");
445                        sml.info("[无效ID] 客户端ID: " + clientId);
446                        sml.info("//当前在线用户数仍为"+connectedClients.size() +"，可能是重复断开请求或客户端状态不一致");
447                    }
448
449                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"已断开连接\"}";
450                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
451                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
452                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
453                    os.write(response.getBytes());
454                    os.close();
455
456                    sml.info("[响应发送] 已确认用户 '" + username + "' 断开连接");
457
458                } catch (Exception e) {
459                    sml.error("[断开异常] " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": " + e.getMessage());
460                    sml.error("[详细错误] 堆栈跟踪:", e);
461                    sml.info("[恢复措施] 正在构造错误响应以通知客户端");
462                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"断开连接失败\"}";
463                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
464                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
465                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
466                    os.write(response.getBytes());
467                    os.close();
468                    sml.info("[响应发送] 已向客户端发送断开失败的错误响应");
469                }
470            } else {
471                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的断开请求");
472                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
473                exchange.close();
474            }
475        }
476    }
477
478    /// 广播处理器类
479    class BroadcastHandler implements HttpHandler {
480        @Override
481        public void handle(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
482            if ("POST".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
483                try {
484                    String clientIp = exchange.getRemoteAddress().getAddress().getHostAddress();
485                        
486                    InputStream inputStream = exchange.getRequestBody();
487                    String requestBody = new String(inputStream.readAllBytes());
488                    inputStream.close();
489                        
490                    String message = "无内容";
491                    String sender = "未知用户";
492                    String clientId = "unknown";
493                        
494                    if (requestBody.contains("\"message\":\"")) {
495                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"message\":\"") + 11;
496                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
497                        if (end > start) {
498                            message = requestBody.substring(start, end);
499                        }
500                    }
501                        
502                    if (requestBody.contains("\"sender\":\"")) {
503                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"sender\":\"") + 10;
504                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
505                        if (end > start) {
506                            sender = requestBody.substring(start, end);
507                        }
508                    }
509                        
510                    if (requestBody.contains("\"clientId\":\"")) {
511                        int start = requestBody.indexOf("\"clientId\":\"") + 12;
512                        int end = requestBody.indexOf("\"", start);
513                        if (end > start) {
514                            clientId = requestBody.substring(start, end);
515                        }
516                    }
517                        
518                    sml.info("[广播] 收到来自 '" + sender + "' (ID: " + clientId + ") 的广播请求, 广播消息: " + message);
519                    broadcastMessage(message);
520                        
521                    String response = "{\"status\":\"success\",\"message\":\"广播消息已处理\"}";
522                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
523                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.getBytes().length);
524                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
525                    os.write(response.getBytes());
526                    os.close();
527                        
528                } catch (Exception e) {
529                    sml.error("[广播错误] 处理广播请求时发生错误: " + e.getMessage());
530                    sml.error("[详细错误] 堆栈跟踪:", e);
531                    String response = "{\"status\":\"error\",\"message\":\"广播处理失败\"}";
532                    exchange.getResponseHeaders().set("Content-Type", "application/json");
533                    exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.getBytes().length);
534                    OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody();
535                    os.write(response.getBytes());
536                    os.close();
537                }
538            } else {
539                sml.warn("[非法请求] 收到非POST方法的广播请求");
540                exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
541                exchange.close();
542            }
543        }
544    }
545
546    /// 停止服务器
547    public void stopServer() throws IOException{
548        sml.info("[服务器关闭] 正在关闭IRC服务器...");
549        sml.info("[关闭统计] 关闭前在线用户数: " + connectedClients.size());
550        closeChatLog();
551        if (!connectedClients.isEmpty()) {
552            sml.info("[强制断开] 以下用户将被强制断开连接:");
553            for (ClientInfo clientInfo : connectedClients.values()) {
554                long onlineSeconds = java.time.Duration.between(clientInfo.getConnectTime(), LocalDateTime.now()).getSeconds();
555                long hours = onlineSeconds / 3600;
556                long minutes = (onlineSeconds % 3600) / 60;
557                long seconds = onlineSeconds % 60;
558                String onlineDuration = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds);
559
560                sml.info("[强制断开] 用户: '" + clientInfo.getUsername() + "' (ID: " + clientInfo.getClientId() + ")");
561                sml.info("[会话信息] 连接时间: " + clientInfo.getFormattedConnectTime() + ", 在线时长: " + onlineDuration);
562            }
563        }
564
565        connectedClients.clear();
566        clientIdCounter = 0;
567
568        serverHttp.stop(0);
569        sml.info("[服务器关闭] IRC服务器已完全关闭");
570        sml.info("[资源清理] 所有客户端连接已清除，资源已释放");
571    }
572
573    /// 获取当前在线用户数
574    /// 这是 api 来的
575    public int getConnectedClientCount() {
576        return connectedClients.size();
577    }
578
579    /// 获取当前在线用户列表
580    /// 这是 api 来的
581    public Map<String, ClientInfo> getConnectedClients() {
582        return new HashMap<>(connectedClients);
583    }
584
585    /**记录聊天日志所必须要使用的一个Method*/
586    private void initializeChatLog() {
587        try {
588            File logDir = new File("./ciclog");
589            if (!logDir.exists()) {
590                logDir.mkdirs();
591            }
592
593            currentChatLogDate = LocalDate.now().toString();
594            String logFileName = "./ciclog/chatlog-s-" + currentChatLogDate + ".log";
595            FileWriter fileWriter = new FileWriter(logFileName, true);
596            chatLogWriter = new PrintWriter(fileWriter, true);
597                
598            sml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志系统已初始化，日志文件: " + logFileName);
599                
600        } catch (IOException e) {
601            sml.error("[聊天日志错误] 初始化聊天日志失败: " + e.getMessage());
602        }
603    }
604
605    ///记录聊天消息
606    /// @param username 用户名
607    /// @param message 消息
608    private void logChatMessage(String username, String message) {
609        try {
610            String today = LocalDate.now().toString();
611            if (!today.equals(currentChatLogDate)) {
612                closeChatLog();
613                initializeChatLog();
614            }
615                
616            if (chatLogWriter != null) {
617                String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(chatLogFormatter);
618                String logEntry = timestamp + " [ " + username + " ] " + message;
619                chatLogWriter.println(logEntry);
620                chatLogWriter.flush();
621            }
622        } catch (Exception e) {
623            sml.error("[聊天日志错误] 记录聊天消息失败: " + e.getMessage());
624        }
625    }
626
627    /**初始化服务器加密系统*/
628    private void initializeServerEncryption(String customKey) {
629        try {
630            sml.info("[服务器加密初始化] 开始初始化服务器加密系统...");
631
632            KeyPairGenerator keyGen = KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
633            if (customKey != null && !customKey.isEmpty()) {
634                // 使用自定义密钥种子
635                SecureRandom secureRandom = SecureRandom.getInstance("SHA1PRNG");
636                secureRandom.setSeed(customKey.getBytes("UTF-8"));
637                keyGen.initialize(2048, secureRandom);
638                sml.info("[服务器加密初始化] 使用自定义密钥种子初始化加密系统");
639            } else {
640                keyGen.initialize(2048, new SecureRandom());
641                sml.info("[服务器加密初始化] 使用随机密钥初始化加密系统");
642            }
643            serverRsaKeyPair = keyGen.generateKeyPair();
644
645            KeyGenerator aesKeyGen = KeyGenerator.getInstance("AES");
646            aesKeyGen.init(256);
647            serverAesKey = aesKeyGen.generateKey();
648            
649            sml.info("[服务器加密初始化] 服务器密钥对和AES密钥生成成功");
650            
651        } catch (Exception e) {
652            sml.error("[服务器加密错误] 初始化加密系统失败: " + e.getMessage());
653        }
654    }
655    
656    /**加密AES密钥*/
657    private String encryptAesKey(PublicKey clientPublicKey) {
658        try {
659            Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
660            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, clientPublicKey);
661            byte[] encryptedKey = cipher.doFinal(serverAesKey.getEncoded());
662            return Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(encryptedKey);
663        } catch (Exception e) {
664            sml.error("[密钥加密错误] AES密钥加密失败: " + e.getMessage());
665            return null;
666        }
667    }
668    
669    /**解密客户端消息*/
670    private String decryptClientMessage(String encryptedMessage, ClientInfo clientInfo) {
671        try {
672            if (!clientInfo.isEncryptionEnabled() || clientInfo.getAesKey() == null) {
673                return encryptedMessage; // 这里未加密直接返回
674            }
675            
676            byte[] decodedBytes = Base64.getDecoder().decode(encryptedMessage);
677            Cipher cipher = Cipher.getInstance("AES");
678            cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, clientInfo.getAesKey());
679            byte[] decryptedBytes = cipher.doFinal(decodedBytes);
680            return new String(decryptedBytes, "UTF-8");
681            
682        } catch (Exception e) {
683            sml.error("[消息解密错误] 客户端消息解密失败: " + e.getMessage());
684            return encryptedMessage; // 解密失败也是返回原文
685        }
686    }
687    
688    /**在使用完毕之后，必须关闭聊天日志记录*/
689    private void closeChatLog() {
690        if (chatLogWriter != null) {
691            chatLogWriter.close();
692            chatLogWriter = null;
693            sml.info("[聊天日志] 聊天日志文件已关闭");
694        }
695    }
696
697    ///向指定客户端发送推送消息
698    /// @param clientId 客户端ID
699    /// @param message 消息
700    private void sendPushMessage(String clientId, String message) throws Exception {
701        ClientInfo clientInfo = connectedClients.get(clientId);
702        if (clientInfo == null) {
703            throw new Exception("客户端不存在");
704        }
705        
706        String clientIp = clientInfo.getIpAddress();
707        String pushUrl = "http://" + clientIp + ":10026/push";
708        
709        HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
710                .uri(URI.create(pushUrl))
711                .timeout(Duration.ofSeconds(5))
712                .header("Content-Type", "application/json")
713                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(message))
714                .build();
715        
716        HttpClient httpClient = HttpClient.newHttpClient();
717        HttpResponse<String> response = httpClient.send(request, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());
718        
719        if (response.statusCode() != 200) {
720            throw new Exception("推送失败，状态码: " + response.statusCode());
721        }
722    }
723
724    /// 广播消息
725    /// @param message 消息
726    public void broadcastMessage(String message) {
727        sml.info("[广播] 向所有在线用户广播消息: " + message);
728        sml.info("[广播统计] 当前在线用户数: " + connectedClients.size());
729            
730        if (connectedClients.isEmpty()) {
731            sml.warn("[广播警告] 没有在线用户，广播消息未发送");
732            return;
733        }
734
735        String timestamp = LocalDateTime.now().format(timeFormatter);
736        String broadcastMsg = "{\"type\":\"broadcast\",\"message\":\"" + message + "\",\"timestamp\":\"" + timestamp + "\"}";
737            
738        int successCount = 0;
739        int failCount = 0;
740            
741        for (ClientInfo clientInfo : connectedClients.values()) {
742            try {
743                sendPushMessage(clientInfo.getClientId(), broadcastMsg);
744                sml.info("[广播发送] 向用户 '" + clientInfo.getUsername() + "' (ID: " + clientInfo.getClientId() + ") 发送广播消息");
745                successCount++;
746            } catch (Exception e) {
747                sml.error("[广播失败] 向用户 '" + clientInfo.getUsername() + "' 发送广播时出错: " + e.getMessage());
748                failCount++;
749            }
750        }
751            
752        sml.info("[广播完成] 广播发送统计 - 成功: " + successCount + "人, 失败: " + failCount + "人");
753    }
754
755};
